{{css:/lib/jgauge/jgauge.css}}

{{html:
<script  src='/lib/jgauge/excanvas.min.js' type='text/javascript'></script>
<script  src='/lib/jgauge/jQueryRotate.min.js' type='text/javascript'></script>
<script  src='/lib/jgauge/jgauge-0.3.0.a3.min.js' type='text/javascript'></script>

<script type="text/javascript">
function createGauge(id, initialValue, start, end, changeInterval) {
    var myGauge = window['myGauge' + id] = new jGauge();
    myGauge.id = id;
    myGauge.width = 200;
    myGauge.height = 114;
    myGauge.ticks.start = start;
    myGauge.ticks.end = end;

    myGauge.imagePath='/lib/jgauge/img/jgauge_face_default.png'
    myGauge.needle.imagePath='/lib/jgauge/img/jgauge_needle_default.png';

    myGauge.init();
    myGauge.setValue(initialValue);
    setInterval(function() {
        var newValue; 
        if (Math.random() > 0.8) // Allow needle to randomly pause.
        {
                rnd= (Math.random()-0.5) * 10 ;
                newValue = initialValue + rnd;
                
                if (newValue >= myGauge.ticks.start && newValue <= myGauge.ticks.end)
                {
                        // newValue is within range, so update.
                        myGauge.setValue(newValue);
                }
        }
    }, changeInterval);
}
</script>

}}
